医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示线粒体在压力下如何寻求帮助最初，高等细胞的动力源线粒体是独立的生物体。法兰克福歌德大学的研究人员以线粒体应激反应为例，研究了它们的新陈代谢在进化过程中与宿主细胞的新陈代谢混合的程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Study-unravels-how-mitochondria-call-for-help-when-under-stress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Study-unravels-how-mitochondria-call-for-help-when-under-stress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5c827be-1f76-4633-bbdc-ef78a3ccde6e Fri, 28 Jul 2023 18:10:31 -0400 Study unravels how mitochondria call for help when under stress
冷冻电镜研究阐明血小板药物转运蛋白的 3D 结构和分子机制中国科学院（CAS）中国科学技术大学（USTC）陈宇星教授和周聪教授领导的研究小组最近利用单粒子低温电子显微镜（cryo-EM）破译了血小板药物转运蛋白ABCC4的3D结构和分子机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Cryo-EM-study-elucidates-3D-struct-and-molecular-mechanism-of-platelet-drug-transporter.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Cryo-EM-study-elucidates-3D-struct-and-molecular-mechanism-of-platelet-drug-transporter.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0c120c8-7478-4108-ba93-96d9ffcd1635 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 18:00:04 -0400 Cryo-EM study elucidates 3D structure and molecular mechanism of platelet drug transporter
新技术可能彻底改变年龄相关性黄斑变性的治疗科学家们找到了一种利用纳米技术创建 3D“支架”的方法，用于从视网膜中培养细胞，为治疗常见失明原因的潜在新方法铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/New-technology-could-revolutionize-treatment-for-age-lated-maulous-degenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/New-technology-could-revolutionize-treatment-for-age-lated-maulous-degenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60fcc157-77d5-4b72-9c3e-0c74199d4157 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 17:58:00 -0400 New technology could revolutionize treatment for age-related macular degeneration
路易斯维尔大学西蒙斯学院研究社区如何影响健康社区的哪些特征有助于或降低居民的健康？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/University-of-Louisville-Simmons-College-to-study-how-neighborhoods-affect-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/University-of-Louisville-Simmons-College-to-study-how-neighborhoods-affect-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=689d1a07-e69f-4a39-9a82-2d76ab0d909a Fri, 28 Jul 2023 17:46:46 -0400 University of Louisville, Simmons College to study how neighborhoods affect health
科学家发现了一种产生天然抗艾滋病毒化合物真实结构的方法控制菜肴的烹饪方式总是一个好主意。受到厨房的启发，科学家们似乎已经找到了一种方法，可以从头到尾生产罕见但天然存在的抗 HIV 化合物兰西内酯 C 的真实结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Scientists-discover-a-way-to- Produce-true-struct-of-naturally-occurring-anti-HIV-compound.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Scientists-discover-a-way-to- Produce-true-struct-of-naturally-occurring-anti-HIV-compound.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2025e60-eb24-4526-bd38-d99e9519d959 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 17:44:36 -0400 Scientists discover a way to produce true structure of naturally-occurring anti-HIV compound
研究：金属仿生组织制造的新范例7月27日，中国科学院理化技术研究所刘静教授领导的研究小组与清华大学合作者在Matter杂志上发表了一项新研究，在创建生物组织方面取得了突破——就像通过两种无生命液体材料、水和液态金属从头开始组装而成的有节奏的团聚体一样。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Study-A-new-paradigm-for-the-fabrication-of-metalic-bionic-tissues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Study-A-new-paradigm-for-the-fabrication-of-metalic-bionic-tissues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0032a755-638a-4c30-bba5-9f4921dafe62 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 13:30:53 -0400 Study: A new paradigm for the fabrication of metallic bionic tissues
开发新型纳米免疫磁珠用于高效检测 SARS-CoV-2 病毒中国科学院合肥物质科学研究院（HFIPS）王俊峰教授领导的研究小组最近开发了一种更有效的检测SARS-CoV-2病毒的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/New-nano-immune-magnet-bead-development-for-efficient-SARS-CoV-2-virus-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/New-nano-immune-magnet-bead-development-for-efficient-SARS-CoV-2-virus-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b888e82-7d15-44f3-8b46-1945c416acb1 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 13:26:00 -0400 New nano-immune magnetic bead developed for efficient SARS-CoV-2 virus detection
强化学习提高基于人工智能的皮肤癌诊断的性能人工智能（AI）已被用于诊断皮肤癌，但它（尚）无法跟上医生在实践中复杂决策的步伐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Reinforcement-learning-improves-performance-of-AI-based-skin-cancer-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Reinforcement-learning-improves-performance-of-AI-based-skin-cancer-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=264417ff-43da-4f49-91c9-d7fd763f1b6b Fri, 28 Jul 2023 13:17:21 -0400 Reinforcement learning improves performance of AI-based skin cancer diagnosis
微生物细胞工厂生产环保食品和化妆品化合物尽管全球人口持续增长数十年，但由于气候变化加剧导致异常天气长期存在，粮食生产力严重下降，战争等国际冲突加剧，全球粮食供应链恶化，全球粮食危机似乎再次来临。全球范围内的粮食短缺和营养不平等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Microbial-cell-factories-product-eco-friend-food-and-cosmetic-compounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Microbial-cell-factories-product-eco-friend-food-and-cosmetic-compounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29e1b19f-b7c6-4f5f-b2a3-72b1cc1e65f1 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 12:58:23 -0400 Microbial cell factories produce eco-friendly food and cosmetic compounds
气候变化驱动的极端天气事件影响亚太地区的艾滋病毒控制在一次科学聚会上，气候变化驱动的极端天气事件、海平面上升、温度变化以及空气和水污染正在影响亚太地区艾滋病毒的控制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Climate-change-driven-extreme-weather-events-impacting-HIV-control-in-Asia-Pacific.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Climate-change-driven-extreme-weather-events-impacting-HIV-control-in-Asia-Pacific.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7277fbc-0da3-47b5-81d1-7e22617b0e55 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 12:36:26 -0400 Climate change-driven extreme weather events impacting HIV control in Asia Pacific
